meanings.definition: A type of open shoe consisting of a sole held on the foot by straps.
meanings.sent1: I wore my sandals to the beach.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of sandals for the summer.
meanings.sent3: The sandals danced off her feet when she ran.
meanings.sent4: His sandals were like boats floating on the sea of sand.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sandals brightened up her outfit.

meanings.definition: A type of footwear consisting of a sole attached to the foot by thongs or straps.
meanings.sent1: His sandals were comfortable for walking long distances.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of sandals on display.
meanings.sent3: The sandals whispered secrets as they walked along the shore.
meanings.sent4: Her sandals were like loyal companions on her journey.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sandals echoed in the empty hallway.
